title: FDA - Static Map
---

```{python}
#| echo: false

import duckdb

# Open DuckDB in-memory (or point to a .duckdb file if you want persistence)
con = duckdb.connect()

# Query directly from the CSV
query = """
SELECT DISTINCT
	case when StreetType is NOT NULL THEN 
    TRIM(
		case when StreetDirection is NOT NULL THEN (COALESCE(StreetDirection, '') || '. ') ELSE '' END ||
        TRIM(COALESCE(StreetName, '')) || ' ' ||
        TRIM(COALESCE(StreetType, '')) || '.' )
	ELSE '' END AS StreetFull
FROM read_csv_auto('Addresses_in_fan.csv', header=True)
WHERE StreetName IS NOT NULL
order by 1
"""

streets = con.execute(query).fetchall()

# Convert to a simple list of strings
streets = [row[0].strip() for row in streets]
print("\n".join(streets))


```
